body: You might be able to avoid having `includes` specified on the `cc_library` if you say `strip_prefix = "lmdb-LMDB_0.9.19/libraries/liblmdb"` here. That way we avoid the performance degradation that the extra includes search path would cause.
body_html: You might be able to avoid having includes specified on the cc_library if you say strip_prefix = "lmdb-LMDB_0.9.19/libraries/liblmdb" here. That way we avoid the performance degradation that the extra includes search path would cause.
body_text: You might be able to avoid having includes specified on the cc_library if you say strip_prefix = "lmdb-LMDB_0.9.19/libraries/liblmdb" here. That way we avoid the performance degradation that the extra includes search path would cause.
